abstract: Miloš Ninković (Serbian Cyrillic: Милош Нинковић; born 25 December 1984) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Serbian SuperLiga club Red Star Belgrade. He was one of the key players for the Serbian national football team during their stint at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
comment: Miloš Ninković (Serbian Cyrillic: Милош Нинковић; born 25 December 1984) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Serbian SuperLiga club Red Star Belgrade. He was one of the key players for the Serbian national football team during their stint at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
name: Miloš Ninković
